00647 
00648 /* Experimental feature - intentionally left undocumented.
00649 This feature exists to simplify performance evaulation and is not recommended
00650 for production use since it delays execution of the workload. 
00651 Force the master to wait for the given number of workers to connect before
00652 starting to dispatch tasks.  
00653 @param q A work queue object.
00654 @param worker The number of workers to wait before tasks are dispatched.*/
00655 void work_queue_activate_worker_waiting(struct work_queue *q, int resources);
